attributes.action: State Funeral for All Prime Ministers
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that all Prime Minister's should be afforded a full state funeral to honour their stint at the highest level of public service they could offer the nation they live in. The politics of the individual Prime Minister in question should not to be taken into account.

This is to end the bizarre situation in which some Prime Ministers such as - Churchill and Thatcher - are afforded the ceremonial funeral or state funeral whilst others - such as Wilson and Heath - are not.
